text:
@realDonaldTrump TOTALLY DISGUSTING,

Trump’s golf company tweeted out a video earlier this month in which golfer John Daly suggested that drinking a bottle of vodka a day can “kill this coronavirus.”

Trump Golf tweeted this video on April 9th
